name: Color
content:
# Color
The color property specifies the color of text. There are [140 color names](https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_names.asp) predefined in the HTML and CSS color specification, such as blue, red, coral, brown, etc. Colors also can be specified in various formats; the RGB colors and the HEX colors are the most used ones.
